Tool

NameWatershed Segmentation (ViGrA)
ID4
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2009
Specificationgrid

Description

Note that the watershed algorithm usually results in an oversegmentation (i.e., too many regions), but its boundary localization is quite good. Based on the example code "watershed.cxx" by Ullrich Koethe. References: ViGrA - Vision with Generic Algorithms http://hci.iwr.uni-heidelberg.de
